description: --- language: en widget: - text: Covid cases are increasing fast! datasets: - tweet_eval --- # Twitter-roBERTa-base for Sentiment Analysis - UPDATED (2022) This is a RoBERTa-base model trained on ~124M tweets from January 2018 to December 2021, and finetuned for sentiment analysis with the TweetEval benchmark. The original Twitter-based RoBERTa model can be found here and the original reference paper is TweetEval. This model is suitable for English. - Reference Paper: TimeLMs paper. - Git Repo: TimeLMs official repository. Labels: 0 -> Negative; 1 -> Neutral; 2 -> Positive This sentiment analysis model has been integrated into TweetNLP. You can access the demo here. ## Example Pipeline ## Full classification example Output: ### References
model_explanation_gemini: Classifies English tweets into negative, neutral, or positive sentiment using a RoBERTa-base model trained on 124M tweets.
